<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1052872_needit_university</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_1052872_needit_university">u_reference_1VALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="u_reference_1" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Populate name on change of code</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	gs.addInfoMessage("Business rule called");
var universityCode = current.u_reference_1; 
	gs.addInfoMessage("University code: " + universityCode);
var universityName = '';

// Quering the University table to retrieve the university name based on the university code
var universityGR = new GlideRecord('x_1052872_needit_univerity_load_data_university'); 
universityGR.addQuery('code', universityCode);
universityGR.query();

if (universityGR.next()) {
universityName = universityGR.u_university_name; 
}

// Set the university name field value in the target table
current.u_string_4= universityName; 

})(current, previous);

/*
function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading, isTemplate) {
if (isLoading || newValue === '' || newValue == oldValue) {
    return;
  }
	
var universityCode = current.u_reference_1; 
var universityName = '';

// Quering the University table to retrieve the university name based on the university code
var universityGR = new GlideRecord('x_1052872_needit_univerity_load_data_university'); 
universityGR.addQuery('code', universityCode);
universityGR.query();

if (universityGR.next()) {
universityName = universityGR.u_university_name; 
}

// Set the university name field value in the target table
current.u_string_4= universityName; 

})(current, previous);
*/]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-04 06:48:33</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>fe2ee84647732110b75a5e52e36d4304</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate name on change of code</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_1052872_needit">55f649cc47132110b75a5e52e36d4379</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">55f649cc47132110b75a5e52e36d4379</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fe2ee84647732110b75a5e52e36d4304</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-04 07:19:47</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=fe2ee84647732110b75a5e52e36d4304"/></record_update>
